org.threadly.concurrent.future

Class AbstractFutureCallbackFailureHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.concurrent.future.AbstractFutureCallbackFailureHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FutureCallback<java.lang.Object>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FutureCallbackExceptionHandlerAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractFutureCallbackFailureHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements FutureCallback<java.lang.Object>

    An abstract implementation of FutureCallback where the result is ignored. This can allow you to easily do an action only on a failure condition (with the failure provided by FutureCallback.handleFailure(Throwable)).

    Since:
    4.4.0
